short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use ChatGPT in ElegantResume's resume builder to improve your resume content.
short.zh_CN: 在ElegantResume里直接用ChatGPT的来改简历。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With this extension, you can use ChatGPT in ElegantResume's resume builder web app. It can help you log in to your ChatGPT account, send your questions to ChatGPT, and get answers from ChatGPT. With the extension, you don't need to manually copy and paste your resume to ChatGPT.
long.zh_CN: The extension is required to use ChatGPT in ElegantResume' resume builder web app. It can help you to login you ChatGPT account, send your questions to ChatGPT, and get answers from ChatGPT. With the extension, you don't need to copy paste your resume to ChatGPT manually.
